column5: 33 and change.
That is huge! What was the length on it?
Beauty.
Very nice, and, yeah that would be a nice one to have with a derby ticket!!
Wow thats a big fish. Its nice to see you release it, man just think of how big it will be at the end of August!
That's not a Salmon, it's a Volkswagon!!!!! Congrats, really nice clean and big fish! HH
are you in a tiller?  i am a big fan of GL fisherman in tillers!  that is an awesome fish...how was the fight?
Nice fish! The water looks nice and clear as well.
Excellent catch, and yes a couple of days early indeed!  Great to see so many 30+ fish being caught this year, it's going to be a tyee filled leaderboard I think.  Tony
Wow, what a beauty.  Nice to see  Joey

I did the exact same thing last year, two days before the derby. Mine was 42x27. I never did officially weigh it, I was too scared to LOL It would have been in the top 3 for the first week!!!  I'm another tiller bigwater troller. Gotta love it!!  What did you get it on?  S.
WOW    Very nice indeed
Wooooooooooooh!!!! Thats a gorgeous, bright, beautiful Chinny!!! Can't wait to bust out the downriggers this fall

this thread is useless without pics...DOH!!!! i mean a write up...oh dont tell me you forgot your pencil at home...do you honestly think we would believe a picture!?!? Come on man!  seriously though ..NICE SHOOTIN!!!!...it may be too early for prizes but your glory is well deserved ......  BEAUTIFUL TYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!  You are already a winner!!!!
I would have tied the damn thing to a stringer and slept in the boat for 2 days
YES!
LOL....you could have fed it for two days...maybe increased that weight even more!!

Lake O - still the best salmon fishery in the world....  BTW, a few in the 34-36 lb range have already been caught... so as nice as your fish is, it wouldn't be close to a derby winner   great catch though!
Who gives a crap about the overall derby, have you seen the weekly prizes?  lol
Who wants a Matrix?   Bring back the Lunds!
I know someone who needs a boat real bad!!!!!  (But he just bought a new TDI, lol)
There's always one that has to spoil it!
awesome fish congrats
For all of you that said keep it I feel sorry for you!
